episode: I recently gave a presentation which I felt wasn't my best work.  I prepared, but my nervousness just got the better of me.  I felt ashamed afterwards.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I recently gave a presentation at work.  It really didn't go well.  I felt ashamed after the meeting.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry to hear that. It's tough when things don't go as planned.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I gave the presentation in front of a number of heads of other offices.  I prepared very well.  However, my nerves got the better of me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really tough, but it's understandable to feel nervous.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I don't know why, but my nerves were out of control.  I normally don't get like this so it shocked me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's okay, it happens to everyone sometimes.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How do you think I could better control my nerves in the future?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Practice deep breathing or visualization techniques.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I see.  Can you give me an example of visualization techniques?  I am not familiar with them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Imagine yourself giving a successful presentation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That sounds very simple.  How long do I need to do this?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Just a few minutes each day leading up to the presentation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That sounds easy to do.  I can sacrifice a few minutes out of my day for better performance.  Do I need to combine the deep breathing with the visualization techniques?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yes, combining them can enhance the effect.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Are there any studies that show that visualization techniques work?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yes, many athletes use them for performance improvement.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Now that you say that, I think I have heard of some athletes who use these visualization techniques.  I wonder if I need to talk to my doctor about my anxiety as well.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It could be helpful to discuss it with your doctor.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I don't like to take medication, but I would be willing to do it to avoid the performance that I had.  I still feel a sense of shame thinking about my performance.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable, but remember, we all have off days.
